title.narrative: P4: Pacific Regional ICT Regulatory Development Project

description.narrative: The development objective of the Project is to strengthen the capacity of ICT Regulatory institutions in participating countries,and enhance regional collaboration on regulatory issues. The primary beneficiaries of the Project are the Pacific islandregulatoryinstitutions. Indirect beneficiaries will include consumers, businesses (including telecommunications operators),government agencies, researchers/academia and communities receiving improved ICT services as a result of enhanced regulatoryoutcomes.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Project Director | Description :Appointment and retention of a Project director for the duration of the Project| Due Date :30-Apr-2015

Finance Agreement :Project implementation-overall | Description :Maintain the Office of the Vice President (Administration), to beresponsible for overseeing overall implementation of the Project. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Project implementation-responsibilities | Description :Maintain, throughout the Project implementation period:(a) the finance office, to be responsible for financial management and procurement management under the Project; (b) the humanresources office, to be responsible for staff related matters under the Project;and (c) the development office , to be responsiblefor monitoring and evaluating the progress of the Project, and furnishing financial r | Frequency :CONTINUOUS
Finance Agreement :Project operations manual | Description :Adoption of a Project operations manual | Due Date :31-Jan-2015
